00039 #define IDENTIFIER_SIZE 8
00040 #define GRD_FILE_IDENTIFIER "\211GRD\r\n\032\n"
00041 const int GRD_FILE_IDENTIFIER_LEN = 8;
00042 #define FILE_VERSION 1.0f
00043 
00045 
00046 bool CGRDFileWriter::WriteHeader()
00047 {
00048         if (WriteFixedHeader() == false)
00049                 return false;
00050         if (WriteTagHeader() == false)
00051                 return false;
00052         if (WriteOptimumCorners() == false)
00053                 return false;
00054         return true;
00055 }
00056 
00058 
00059 bool CGRDFileWriter::WriteFixedHeader()
00060 {
00061         // Write the header.
00062         m_outstr.write(GRD_FILE_IDENTIFIER, GRD_FILE_IDENTIFIER_LEN);
00063 
00064         WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, m_HeaderData.GetVersion());
00065 
00066         // Write the dimensions of the array
00067         WriteUInt32_N(m_outstr, m_HeaderData.GetRows());
00068         WriteUInt32_N(m_outstr, m_HeaderData.GetCols());
00069 
00070         // Write the other members.
00071         WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, m_HeaderData.GetFeaturePitchX());
00072         WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, m_HeaderData.GetFeaturePitchY());
00073         WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, m_HeaderData.GetFeatureSetbackX());
00074         WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, m_HeaderData.GetFeatureSetbackY());
00075 
00076         // Check the status.
00077         if (m_outstr.fail())
00078                 return false;
00079         return true;
00080 }
00081 
00083 
00084 bool CGRDFileWriter::WriteTagHeader()
00085 {
00086         // write the number of bytes in the section - placeholder
00087         std::streampos posStart = m_outstr.tellp();
00088         WriteUInt32_N(m_outstr, 0L);
00089 
00090         StrStrMap& props = m_HeaderData.GetParameters();
00091 
00092         // write the number of name-value pair strings.
00093         WriteUInt32_N(m_outstr, props.size());
00094 
00095         for( StrStrMap::iterator ii = props.begin(); ii != props.end(); ++ii )
00096         {
00097                 WriteString_N(m_outstr, ii->first);
00098                 WriteString_N(m_outstr, ii->second);
00099         }
00100 
00101         // go back and write the number of bytes
00102         std::streampos posCurr = m_outstr.tellp();
00103         m_outstr.seekp(posStart);
00104         WriteUInt32_N(m_outstr, posCurr - posStart);
00105         m_outstr.seekp(posCurr);
00106 
00107         // Check the status.
00108         if (m_outstr.fail())
00109                 return false;
00110         return true;
00111 }
00112 
00114 
00115 bool CGRDFileWriter::WriteOptimumCorners()
00116 {
00117         const uint32_t nSubgridCoordSize = FLOAT_SIZE*8;
00118 
00119         // write the number of bytes in the section
00120         WriteUInt32_N(m_outstr, nSubgridCoordSize*m_HeaderData.GetNumSubgrids()+ULONG_SIZE*2);
00121 
00122         // write the number of subgrids.
00123         WriteUInt32_N(m_outstr, m_HeaderData.GetNumSubgrids());
00124 
00125         // write subgrids
00126         for (uint32_t i = 0; i < m_HeaderData.GetNumSubgrids(); ++i  )
00127         {
00128                 FRECT r = m_HeaderData.GetOptSubgrid(i);
00129 
00130                 WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, r.ul.fx);
00131                 WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, r.ul.fy);
00132                 WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, r.ur.fx);
00133                 WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, r.ur.fy);
00134                 WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, r.ll.fx);
00135                 WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, r.ll.fy);
00136                 WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, r.lr.fx);
00137                 WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, r.lr.fy);
00138         }
00139 
00140         // Check the status.
00141         if (m_outstr.fail())
00142                 return false;
00143         return true;
00144 }

00147 
00148 bool CGRDFileWriter::CreateNewFile()
00149 {
00150         // Create a new file.
00151         m_outstr.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::out | std::ios::binary);
00152         if (m_outstr)
00153         {
00154                 return WriteHeader();
00155         }
00156         return false;
00157 }
00158 
00160 
00161 bool CGRDFileWriter::WriteCenter(const FCOORD& center)
00162 {
00163         // Write the center data.
00164         WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, center.fx);
00165         WriteFloat_N(m_outstr, center.fy);
00166 
00167         // Check the status.
00168         if (m_outstr.fail())
00169                 return false;
00170         return true;
00171 }
00172 
00174 
00175 bool CGRDFileWriter::CloseNewFile()
00176 {
00177         // Close the file.
00178         m_outstr.close();
00179 
00180         // Check the status.
00181         if (m_outstr.fail())
00182                 return false;
00183         return true;
00184 }
